metadata.title: CVE-2024-12085 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
[Info Leak via uninitialized Stack contents defeats ASLR]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-12085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rsync package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3').
